sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(10 \), \(16 \), \(25 \), and \(35 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $10 + z $, $16 + z $, $25 + z $, $35 + z $ are in proportion, we have}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + z }{16 + z } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + z }{35 + z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (10 + z )(35 + z ) = (16 + z )(25 + z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 350 + z (\input[s2v1]{} ) + z ^2 = 400 + z (\input[s2v2]{} ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (45 - 41 ) = 400 - 350 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{400 - 350 }{45 - 41 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 3, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v3]{} }{2 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [10, 25], "text": "$$\text{Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get} \frac{10 + z }{16 + z } = \frac{25 + z }{35 + z }$$"}, {"data": [45, 41], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	z = \frac{400 - 350 }{45 - 41 }
\]"}, {"data": [50, 4, 25], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as \[z= \frac{25 }{2 }\] "}]
